00002 #define CFRUSTRUM_H_

00004 #include "math/vector3d.hpp"

00011 #define IN_FRUSTUM      1
00012 #define OUTSIDE_FRUSTUM 0

00016 namespace camera
00017 {
00018 inline bool AreCollinear(const math::vector3d& a,const math::vector3d& b,const math::vector3d& c)
00019 {
00020         return abs_sq((b - a) * (c - a)) < math::eps * math::eps;
00021 }
00022 class EXPORT Frustum : virtual public ::EngineSubsystem
00023 {
00024 public:
00025         Frustum()
00026         {
00027                 rapi = core::EngineCore::getRenderingDriver();
00028 
00029                 m_VertexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00030                 m_VertexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::VERTEX);
00031                 m_VertexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(math::vector3d)*8,&m_Verts[0]);
00032 
00033                 m_IndexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00034                 m_IndexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::INDEX);
00035                 m_IndexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(unsigned short int)*22,m_Indicies);
00036         }
00037         Frustum(const math::vector3d& orig, const math::plane& near,const math::plane& far) : Origin(orig), NearPlane(near),FarPlane(far)
00038         {
00039                 rapi = core::EngineCore::getRenderingDriver();
00040 
00041                 m_VertexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00042                 m_VertexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::VERTEX);
00043                 m_VertexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(math::vector3d)*8,&m_Verts[0]);
00044 
00045                 m_IndexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00046                 m_IndexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::INDEX);
00047                 m_IndexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(unsigned short int)*22,m_Indicies);
00048         }
00049         Frustum(const Frustum& fr) : Origin(fr.Origin), NearPlane(fr.NearPlane),FarPlane(fr.FarPlane)
00050         {
00051                 rapi = core::EngineCore::getRenderingDriver();
00052                 m_Verticies[0] = fr.m_Verticies[0];
00053                 m_Verticies[1] = fr.m_Verticies[1];
00054                 m_Verticies[2] = fr.m_Verticies[2];
00055                 m_Verticies[3] = fr.m_Verticies[3];
00056 
00057                 m_Planes[0]    = fr.m_Planes[0];
00058                 m_Planes[1]    = fr.m_Planes[1];
00059                 m_Planes[2]    = fr.m_Planes[2];
00060                 m_Planes[3]    = fr.m_Planes[3];
00061 
00062                 m_VertexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00063                 m_VertexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::VERTEX);
00064                 m_VertexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(math::vector3d)*8,&m_Verts[0]);
00065 
00066                 m_IndexBuffer = rapi->createVertexBufferObject();
00067                 m_IndexBuffer->setTarget(renderer::VBOTarget::INDEX);
00068                 m_IndexBuffer->setData(renderer::VBOUsage::DYNAMIC_DRAW,sizeof(unsigned short int)*22,m_Indicies);
00069         }
00070         ~Frustum()
00071         {
00072         }
00073 
00074         void    setVertex(const math::vector3d& vert,unsigned pos)
00075         {
00076                 m_Verticies[pos] = vert;
00077         }
00078 
00079         void    setVerticies(const math::vector3d* vert)
00080         {
00081                 m_Verticies[0] = vert[0];
00082                 m_Verticies[1] = vert[1];
00083                 m_Verticies[2] = vert[2];
00084                 m_Verticies[3] = vert[3];
00085         }
00086         void    reset() //Build planes
00087         {
00088                 if(!AreCollinear(Origin,m_Verticies[0],m_Verticies[3]))
00089                         m_Planes[0] = math::plane(Origin,m_Verticies[0],m_Verticies[3]);
00090                 if(!AreCollinear(Origin,m_Verticies[1],m_Verticies[0]))
00091                         m_Planes[1] = math::plane(Origin,m_Verticies[1],m_Verticies[0]);
00092                 if(!AreCollinear(Origin,m_Verticies[2],m_Verticies[1]))
00093                         m_Planes[2] = math::plane(Origin,m_Verticies[2],m_Verticies[1]);
00094                 if(!AreCollinear(Origin,m_Verticies[3],m_Verticies[2]))
00095                         m_Planes[3] = math::plane(Origin,m_Verticies[3],m_Verticies[2]);
00096                 //Check for getNormal() correctness
00097                 math::vector3d v = (m_Verticies[0] + m_Verticies[1] + m_Verticies[2] + m_Verticies[3])*0.25f;
00098                 if(m_Planes[0].classify(v) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00099                         m_Planes[0].flip();
00100                 if(m_Planes[1].classify(v) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00101                         m_Planes[1].flip();
00102                 if(m_Planes[2].classify(v) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00103                         m_Planes[2].flip();
00104                 if(m_Planes[3].classify(v) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00105                         m_Planes[3].flip();
00106         }
00107         void updateIndexBuffer()
00108         {
00109                 m_Indicies[0] =  0;m_Indicies[1] =  1;
00110                 m_Indicies[2] =  2;m_Indicies[3] =  3;
00111                 m_Indicies[4] =  4;m_Indicies[5] =  5;
00112                 m_Indicies[6] =  6;m_Indicies[7] =  7;
00113 
00114                 m_Indicies[8] =  0;
00115                 m_Indicies[9] =  1;
00116                 m_Indicies[10] = 1;
00117                 m_Indicies[11] = 0;
00118                 m_Indicies[12] = 0;
00119                 m_Indicies[13] = 2;
00120                 m_Indicies[14] = 6;
00121                 m_Indicies[15] = 4;
00122                 m_Indicies[16] = 4;
00123                 m_Indicies[17] = 5;
00124                 m_Indicies[18] = 5;
00125                 m_Indicies[19] = 7;
00126                 m_Indicies[20] = 3;
00127                 m_Indicies[21] = 1;
00128                 m_IndexBuffer->setSubData(0,sizeof(unsigned short int)*22,m_Indicies);
00129         }
00130         void updateVertexBuffer()
00131         {
00132                 m_Verts[0] = m_Verticies[0]*NearPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[0],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00133                 m_Verts[1] = m_Verticies[0]*FarPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[0],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00134                 m_Verts[2] = m_Verticies[1]*NearPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[1],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00135                 m_Verts[3] = m_Verticies[1]*FarPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[1],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00136                 m_Verts[4] = m_Verticies[2]*NearPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[2],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00137                 m_Verts[5] = m_Verticies[2]*FarPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[2],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00138                 m_Verts[6] = m_Verticies[3]*NearPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[3],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00139                 m_Verts[7] = m_Verticies[3]*FarPlane.getDistance()/((m_Verticies[3],NearPlane.getNormal()));
00140                 m_VertexBuffer->setSubData(0,sizeof(math::vector3d)*8,&m_Verts[0]);
00141         }
00142         void   move(const math::vector3d& d)
00143         {
00144                 Origin  += d;
00145                 NearPlane.move(d);
00146                 FarPlane.move(d);
00147                 m_Planes[0].move(d);
00148                 m_Planes[1].move(d);
00149                 m_Planes[2].move(d);
00150                 m_Planes[3].move(d);
00151         }
00152 
00153         void setPosition(const math::vector3d& p)
00154         {
00155                 Origin = p;
00156         }
00157 
00158         void   rotate(math::quaternion& d)
00159         {
00160                 m_Rotation      *= d;
00161                 NearPlane.rotate(d);
00162                 FarPlane.rotate(d);
00163                 m_Planes[0].rotate(d);
00164                 m_Planes[1].rotate(d);
00165                 m_Planes[2].rotate(d);
00166                 m_Planes[3].rotate(d);
00167                 m_RotMtx = m_Rotation;
00168         }
00169 
00170         void setOrientation(const math::quaternion& q)
00171         {
00172                 m_Rotation = q;
00173                 m_RotMtx   = q;
00174         }
00175 
00176         int    operator ()(const math::vector3d& point)//check point
00177         {
00178                 if(NearPlane.classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00179                         return false;
00180                 if(FarPlane.classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00181                         return false;
00182                 if(m_Planes[0].classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00183                         return false;
00184                 if(m_Planes[1].classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00185                         return false;
00186                 if(m_Planes[2].classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00187                         return false;
00188                 if(m_Planes[3].classify(point) == math::plane::IN_BACK)
00189                         return false;
00190         }
00191         void   render() //Renders frustum
00192         {
00193                 //TODO: Add moving to position code here
00194                 rapi->enableClientState(renderer::ClientState::VERTEX_ARRAY);
00195                 m_VertexBuffer->bind();
00196                 rapi->vertexPointer(renderer::DataType::FLOAT,3,0,m_VertexBuffer);
00197                 m_VertexBuffer->unbind();
00198                 m_IndexBuffer->bind();
00199                 rapi->pushMatrix();
00200                 rapi->translate(Origin);
00201                 rapi->multMatrix(m_RotMtx);
00202                 rapi->drawIndexedPrimitive(renderer::Primitive::TRIANGLE_STRIP,22,renderer::DataType::UNSIGNED_SHORT,m_IndexBuffer);
00203                 rapi->popMatrix();
00204                 m_IndexBuffer->unbind();
00205                 rapi->disableClientState(renderer::ClientState::VERTEX_ARRAY);
00206         }
00207         //As in camera, everything is public,as speed is in favour
00208         math::vector3d          Origin;
00209         //Set at the begining
00210         math::plane                             NearPlane;
00211         math::plane                             FarPlane;
00212 protected:
00213         renderer::RenderingAPIDriver* rapi;
00214         math::quaternion                        m_Rotation;
00215         math::matrix4x4                 m_RotMtx;
00216         //Can be added by the way
00217         math::vector3d          m_Verticies[4];
00218         math::plane                     m_Planes[4];
00219 
00220         math::vector3d          m_Verts[8];
00221         unsigned short int      m_Indicies[22];
00222         renderer::VertexBufferObject*           m_VertexBuffer;
00223         renderer::VertexBufferObject*   m_IndexBuffer;
00224 };
00225 }
